recommendations.use_https: Serve auth pages and cookies over HTTPS (TLS).
recommendations.secure_cookie_flags: Set Secure; HttpOnly; SameSite=strict or Lax on session cookies.
recommendations.session_regeneration: Regenerate session identifier after login (prevent fixation).
recommendations.rate_limit: Apply rate limiting and exponential backoff on failed auth attempts.
recommendations.account_lockout: Implement progressive lockouts or CAPTCHA after repeated failures.
recommendations.mfa: Provide multi-factor authentication for sensitive accounts.
recommendations.bind_session: Consider binding sessions to additional attributes (IP/UA) cautiously.
